name: StarCore (BluePyramid)
description:
VANQUISH THE ENEMY ALIENS AND LIVE

Not far from planet earth, there is a war between alien artificial intelligence units and human soldiers. 

StarCore, the Special Force created during this war, initially were only a group of normal human soldiers, but as time went by StarCore started to use body modifications and augmentations, therefore losing some of their humanity in order to keep up against the enemy. After using alien technology and losing an unfortunate great number of soldiers, there is finally a chance for humanity to win.

“Everyone is counting on you, soldier… don’t let all our sacrifices go to waste!”

Fight for humanity and finish what others couldn't, with your spaceship in the void of space shooting and dodging bullets from high intelligent aliens you are one of the few hopes left to humanity.

Features

• StarCore is inpired in the golden era of fliperamas, with a shoot'em up and pixel art graphics, you will be able to experience that type of game once again.

• There is no downtime in StarCore, the action is frenentic with bullets flying all over the screen and enemies moving through space.

• StarCore features a 2bit art style with the colours: black, blue, red and white, so as you can see it is colorblind friendly.

Controls

P or Spacebar to access the pause menu

WASD / Arrow Keys for movement

Z  or Left Mouse Button to shoot

X to use the bomb/shield

Shift Key for slow movement

Ctrl Key for switching shooting styles
